pages.text: Runeshfters are Scalar Utils 5's alternatives to conveyor belts, that carry entities at progressively faster speeds. Runeshifters however are locked to a cardinal direction at their creation, however this is no problem as one runeshifter can be crafted into another.
Above are the crafting recipes to acquire an Ultimate Runeshifter (North) and an Ultimate Runeshifter (East).
Above are the crafting recipes to acquire an Ultimate Runeshifter (West) and an Ultimate Runeshifter (South).
Above are the alternative crafting recipes to acquire an Ultimate Runeshifter (North) and an Ultimate Runeshifter (East).
Above are the alternative crafting recipes to acquire an Ultimate Runeshifter (West) and an Ultimate Runeshifter (South).
